alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Seneca (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:48PM EDT until June 26 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Seneca County in central New York... Northwestern Cayuga County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seneca Falls, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seneca Falls, Waterloo, Port Byron, Montezuma, Union Springs, Tyre, Cayuga, Canoga, Lehigh Vallley Junction and Border City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
